text:
Wikia

FULL TIME in SAN FRANCISCO, CA

Sr. Front-End Engineer, Sr. Web Application Engineer (LAMP stack), Sr. Back-End Engineer (Search engine/large scaling).

A few highlights about Wikia: ·We are among the top-50 sites in US and have 55mm global uniques per month. (http://www.quantcast.com/p-8bG6eLqkH6Avk .) .Jimmy Wales- Co-Founder of Wikipedia is the same Co-Founder at Wikia. ·We contribute to and use open-source software. We are based on MediaWiki, the same software used to power Wikipedia, and we contribute to that project.

Please email Kit at wikia-inc dot com
